query1: SELECT * FROM table1 LEFT JOIN table2 ON table1.column_name = table2.column_name
query2: SELECT column_name(s) FROM table1 LEFT JOIN table2 ON table1.column_name = table2.column_name
query3: SELECT * table1 LEFT JOIN table2 ON table1.id = tables2.customer_id LEFT JOIN table3 ON table.name = table3.name
query4: SELECT * table1 LEFT JOIN table2 ON table1.id = tables2.customer_id LEFT JOIN table3 ON table.name = table3.name orderBy table1.id
